snippet: Bond fund managers who concentrate on corporate issues have lately been able to beat the bond indexes, where government bonds can carry huge weight.
abstract: Paul J Lim Fundamentally column observes bond funds are on track for their best year since 2009, with average taxable fund gaining 6.8 percent through first three quarters of 2012; managers who concentrate on corporate issues have lately been able to beat the bond indexes, where government bonds can carry huge weight.
lead_paragraph: Bond fund managers who concentrate on corporate issues have lately been able to beat the bond indexes, where government bonds can carry huge weight.

headline.seo: Bond Funds Excel by Avoiding Indexes
